rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with large floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the garden. Vastu-aligned positioning.
Open-plan living room integrated with dining area, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and a view of the garden. Bohemian decor influences design.
Functional modern kitchen with an open concept adjoining the dining area and living room. Designed for efficient workflow.
A versatile family space for relaxation and entertainment, featuring decorative floor-to-ceiling windows that let in ample natural light.
Guest bedroom designed with a comfortable layout and privacy. Features include floor-to-ceiling windows for a Bohemian touch.
Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Floor-to-ceiling windows ensure natural light and a Bohemian aesthetic.
Well-lit bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and personalized decor.
Compact yet comfortable bedroom featuring large windows and a modern design approach.
Functional bedroom with floor-to-ceiling window design to enhance the bohemian aesthetic and natural lighting.
Additional bedroom designed for flexibility with a Bohemian twist and ample window space.
Smallest bedroom on this floor, optimized for privacy and natural light with floor-to-ceiling windows.
Fully functional bathroom serving multiple bedrooms. Designed with Vastu principles in mind for privacy and harmony.

garden.description: Large garden space with indigenous plants and a dedicated area for relaxation.

swimming_pool.description: Sizable swimming pool integrated within the garden, designed to complement the bohemian aesthetic.
